ranked_diseases.disease_name: Multiple self-healing squamous epithelioma, susceptibility to
ranked_diseases.explanation: The patient presents with Self-healing squamous epithelioma, which is the hallmark feature of this condition. The similar reference cases also point to this diagnosis.
Ferguson-Smith disease is another name for Multiple self-healing squamous epithelioma, and it is considered the same condition. It is ranked second as it is synonymous with the top-ranked disease.

ranked_diseases.disease_name: Familial primary self-healing squamous epithelioma of the skin
ranked_diseases.explanation: This is another synonym for Multiple self-healing squamous epithelioma, and thus is ranked third as it represents the same underlying condition.
